name: Defines Temporal Order Measures
description: Establishes the mathematical measures and dynamical equations that quantify and describe the emergence of temporal order in complex systems.
subject: urn:uor:resource:emergent-temporal-order
contextualDescription: The Emergent Temporal Order resource defines formal measures of temporal order including the order parameter quantifying synchronization degree, dynamical equations describing coherence-driven evolution, critical coupling thresholds for order emergence, and hierarchical structure functions revealing multi-scale temporal organization.
